name: LiteWood: Pickup!
description:
Made in 5 days for the SIA Summer 2019 Game Jam!

LiteWood: Pickup is  a game where you have to help your community by picking up trash! Unite the community and make the world a cleaner place! Along with picking up trash, you must clean the pool, tables, and arcade machines

WASD for movement of the main character, Kaede

Spacebar to pick up trash and clean.

Please report any bugs that you find.

Art - Kimari (@corgiinked on Twitter)

Writing/Mechanic Writing - Hasani

Level Design - Tafar-I

Programming - Sarah (@sarapppng on Twitter and here on itch!)

Sound Design - Lia (@liafik on Instagram)
